title: Resurrection: New Faces Hub
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=redredred, Nagiros, Grigori Karpin, and Calibold]]
[[=]]
[[module ListPages range="."]]
**%%title%%**
[[/module]]

**[[[r3d Author Page|redredred Author Page]]]**
**[[[Nagiros|The Crab Den (Nagiros' Author Page)]]]**
**[[[Grigori Karpin's Author Page]]]**
**[[[Calibri Bold's Mega Cool Author Page|Calibold's Mega Cool Author Page]]]**
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

Director Sophia Light is in a precarious position.  Chosen to head a new Mobile Task Force made up (at least partially) by anomalous individuals by the powers that be, Director Light has a lot of pressure on her.  As we have seen so far, the recruitment and assembling of a team has gone slowly.  But Director Light has always felt that a singular team was the biggest flaw in the legacy of Omega-7, and she is insistent that in order for the MTF Alpha-9 ("Last Hope") to be effective more than one team would need to be ready to deal with emergencies.  It is in this scenario our story opens: Director Light is looking to recruit new members to her provisional MTF.

At the same time, an anomaly beneath a Site in Yellowstone has begun to wake up.   This object is left over from a previous Restructuring Event at the hands of [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/incident-zero-part-5 | SCP-076]]] and reality hasn't ever truly healed from that incident.  
[[=]]
And //someone// has to deal with it...
[[/=]]
[[=]]
[[div style="center no-repeat ; float: center; border: solid 5px #000000; padding: 1px 15px; background:#EEEEEE    ; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/grigori-karpin-s-author-page/yellowstoneC width="400px"]]

@@ @@

+++ __Intro__
[[=]]
//In which the world's rules are set in stone.//
[[/=]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/new-faces-overture | New Faces: Overture]]]**
by [[user redredred]]
//Part of that was true, but Anne didn’t know what. Maybe it didn’t matter.//

------

+++ __Arrival__

[[=]]
//In which the problem is confronted by new and familiar faces.//
[[/=]]

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/recruitment-drive | Recruitment Drive]]]**
by [[user Nagiros]]
//"I hope you save the world, Director Light."//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/welcome-to-yellowstone | Welcome to Yellowstone]]]**
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
//“Why does the earth shake? Why do the heavens wake? It does what it does, there is no reason. Tis time for a disastrous season.”//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-team-you-can-maybe-trust | A Team You Can (Maybe) Trust]]]**
by [[user Calibold]]
//"You mean you can't even see it? We had problems with just Able and Iris back in the day. Now look at what you have."//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/jolly-cooperation | Jolly Cooperation]]]**
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
//"You humans are always betraying one another. Amazes me that civilization hasn’t crumbled long before now."//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/light-and-the-mole | Light and the Mole]]]**
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
//“Oh look, a manhunt! You favorite!”//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/gomboc | Gömböc]]]**
by [[user redredred]]
//There was no alarm.//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bottom-floor | Bottom Floor]]]**
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
//A fulcrum! A universal pry bar, to crack open the weight of millennia worth of constant observations by the beings of this universe. Such that, the incredible becomes mundane. And the mundane becomes the impossible.//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/truth-lies | Truth Lies]]]**
by [[user Calibold]]
//"Does this mean we're friends?"//

-----
+++ __Outro__
//in which our events come to a close and our characters deal with the ramifications of all they've seen.//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/shut-it-down | Shut It Down]]]**
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
//We don’t have any more options, Sophia. Look… I’m giving you another hour and then I’m taking these people out of here. You can stay if you want.//
@@ @@

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/tangled-web | Tangled Web]]]**
by [[user Grigori Karpin]]
//Let me be clear, the following briefing is not to leave this room. In fact, I’ve already activated a memetic agent on all of you to stop you from repeating it.//

-----
//**The End.... [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/resurrection-his-will-be-done-hub | for now!]]]**//
-----
@@ @@
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/resurrection/resurrection%283%29.png width="600px" link="resurrection"]]

[[/div]]
[[/=]]
